title: Nightwork [Widescreen]
creator_credit: AFTRS, Nicki Roller and Jane Schneider
brief_description: A gay primary school teacher discovers through her pupils that her lover may be cheating on her. She decides to take action by hiring a private detective to find the “other woman” and prove infidelity. Cast includes Gosia Dobrowolska and Shayne Foote.
